about_the_game:
Death in the afternoon is a narrative and detective game. Let yourself immersed as Arthur and get caught up in alcohol addiction. As you live through night parties, prepare yourself for the inevitable BlackOut. Gather as much clues as you can before passing out...

After waking up, you'll have to get out of a tricky situation as best as you can. Take back the control of your life to fix what need to be fixed before the next party...

Game features :


  • Play parties in 3rd person.
  • When the sun rises, explore in first person.
  • Gather clues in your phone.
  • Make your choices in multiple-choices dialogues.
  • Navigate a boat.
  • Learn hox to fish.
  • Solve the riddles and conclude the scenarios.
  • 3 Parties and 5 Scenarios.

Game in early access.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is designed for an adult audience. Death In The Afternoon depicts excessive alcohol consumption directly through the main character. 
There's also mention of harassment linked to homophobia, and the damage it can do to a person.
